title: surf and paddleboard lessons
seo_description: Hawaii has an extensive surf history and culture. Take part in it by signing up for a lesson right on Waikiki Beach.
contents_1: Hawaii has an extensive surf history and culture. Take part in it by signing up for a lesson right on Waikiki Beach.
description: Hawaii has a unique surf history and culture. Take part in it by signing up for a lesson right on Waikiki Beach in the same spot where Duke Kahanamoku modernized the Hawaiian sport. If you’re not into surfing, try your hand at Stand Up Paddling (SUP), a great experience for all ages and activity levels
